question: For which of the following purposes will it be appropriate to use a list: (a) storing the names of all countries, (b) storing the population of all countries each year?

answers.feedback: Incorrect! Although a list can be used, a tuple will be more efficient, assuming that the number of countries and their names do not change.
Correct! The population of countries may change . Thus, a list will be appropriate.
Incorrect! Although a list can be used for (a), a tuple will be more efficient, assuming that the number of countries and their names do not change.
